nodes.text: Creatures of KOTOR 3: Viper Kinrath and Mykal

Creatures of KOTOR 3: Viper Kinrath and Mykal is an article written by Eric Cagle as a supplement for the Saga Edition of the Star Wars Roleplaying Game. It was published by Wizards of the Coast on January 28, 2009 and is the third of a series of web enhancements that present information that could not be included in the Knights of the Old Republic Campaign Guide due to space considerations. As its title suggests, the article provides gaming statistics and lore relating to the viper kinrath and the mykal for the use of gamemasters and players during gaming sessions.
